name: Cubibic 2d 3rd beta
description:
NOTE:Cubibic 2d is a  project and not a game,no more levels are planned 

Also this game has a big difficulty level,bc of its playtime,the game is 100% passable

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bugs: If you want to pause the game you have to press "escape" 2 times because the game was not made for webgl

              If the level is not working again press "escape" 2 times to unfreeze the game and then you can put it back in fullscreen

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: W,S = up, down

                      A,D = left,right

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pls leave a comment or a review after you play the game
